participant_1.background:

Rita Hayworth is my idol and I like to work out to stay in shape.
i would rather read a book than watch a movie.
I love spending time with my grandpa on the weekend.
I am worried about my child's future.

i have my own salon.

content.text: Hi!
Hi there! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I am doing pretty well too! I am a little bit nervous because I have a big exam tomorrow.
Oh no, good luck on your exam! What class is it for?
It is for my organic chemistry class. I am worried because I have not been doing so well in the class.
I am sure you will do great! Just remember everything you have learned and try to stay calm.
Thanks! I will try my best.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play football, listen to music, and spend time with my friends and family.
That sounds like fun! I like to read books, work out, and spend time with my family.
Oh, I love to read books too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read all sorts of books, but some of my favorites are The Great Gatsby, To Kill a Mockingbird, and The Catcher in the Rye.
Those are all great books! I have read The Great Gatsby and To Kill a Mockingbird, but I have not read The Catcher in the Rye yet.
You should definitely read it! It is a really good book.
I will check it out!
It is a classic!
Ok, I will!
Have you heard of Rita Hayworth?
No, I have not. Who is she?
Rita Hayworth was an American actress who was active in the film industry from the 1930s to the 1980s. She is considered one of the most beautiful actresses of all time.
Oh, she sounds really cool! I will have to look her up.
She is! You will like her.
Ok, I will
